nodes.bodyText: remove hint to shop as it has nothing to do with this helper class?

Suggested change

                    value="Provides a template to integrate RSS feeds. WARNING - USE WITH CAUTION: This tag does integrate and render external resources which may potentially contain malicious content! Please always ensure that the source from which the contents are fetched is trustworthy!" />
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+<i:arg type="String" name="url" description="the full URL to the RSS feed" />
+<i:arg type="int" name="span" default="2" description="the span for md-devices" />
+<i:arg type="int" name="smallSpan" default="12" description="the span for xs-devices" />
+<i:arg type="String" name="class" default="rssFeed" description="the attribute which the class name will be extended with" />
+<i:arg type="boolean" name="showDescription" default="true" description="determines if the RSS feed description will be rendered" />
+<i:arg type="boolean" name="showHeaderImage" default="true" description="determines if the RSS header image will be rendered" />
+<i:arg type="boolean" name="showHeader" default="true" description="determines if the RSS feed will show the header information in general, such as the RSS feed title and image" />
+<i:arg type="boolean" name="useFeedTitle" default="true" description="determines if the RSS feed title will be used or ignored, headerTitleExtension will be displayed though" />
+<i:arg type="String" name="headerTitleExtension" default="" description="extends the RSS feed title by the given string" />
+
+<i:pragma
+        name="description"
+        value="Provides an template to integrate RSS feeds. WARNING - USE WITH CAUTION: This tag does integrate and render external resources which may potentially contain malicious content! Please always ensure that the source from which the contents are fetched is trustworthy!" />

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change

             * Helps to read RSS feeds and provides access to their content wrapped into {@link SyndFeed} objects.
